LIBTR23.original: No More Dead Trees For Liberty Tree?
Death and Destruction at Construction Site
LIBTR23.translated: 建筑工地的死亡与毁灭

LIBTR23.original: The Liberty Tree goes 2.0 with a whole new business plan. In light of the recent report by the National Library Center that the net generation does not read books or newspapers unless they are online, the publishers of the Liberty Tree are planning to cease the newsprint version of the paper by 2010. Readers will still be able to read their news stories online via wireless mobile devices and high-speed internet connections and blog and call each other names and be assholes on message boards. "This really is the future. It's 2.0. It's interactive. Paper books and newsprint will be phased out by the end of the decade. Ebooks and web news are the future. Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go to a webinar," said associate publisher, Louis Fertinatta, on his new blog, which he started because some 22-year-old prick in marketing told him it was essential to the future, man.
LIBTR23.translated: 伴随着全新的商业计划，Liberty Tree将进入2.0时代。根据国家图书馆中心近期发表的报告，互联网一代只在网上读书看报，Liberty Tree出版社计划在2010年前停止发行纸质版报纸。读者获取新闻消息的途径还有很多，比如无线移动设备、高速互联网、公开博客、激情对骂、论坛钓鱼。「这就是未来，这就是2.0时代，未来将充满交互。纸质的书籍和报纸会在21世纪的第一个十年后渐渐消失。电子书和在线新闻才是未来。我要去参加在线会议了，恕我失陪。」 副出版人Louis Fertinatta在他的新博客上如是写道，而他开始写博客只是因为市场部的某个22岁混蛋告诉他：「这对未来至关重要。」天哪。

LIBTR23.original: Strike disintegrates into violence at Amir development
LIBTR23.translated: Amir开发地块的罢工转向暴力

LIBTR23.original: Several members of the local Liberty City union for construction workers were massacred on a building site today. The site had been shut down because of disagreements with the property developer, Yusuf Amir, that resulted in a strike. No one is sure what caused the altercation but the union, which was long alleged to have links with organized crime, seems to have had several heavily armed delegates at the site.
LIBTR23.translated: 今日，自由城建筑工人工会的几名成员在一处建筑工地惨遭杀害。因与开发商Yusuf Amir间存在分歧，此前工人们发起了罢工。尽管没人知道这起纠纷的原因，但这一工会一直被指与犯罪组织关系密切，当时似乎在工地派驻了几名全副武装的代表。
